price: 21. Woo mari usun Yallal dirab ginnaasiteenimih sabbatah addunyaa kee akeeral sinni nafsi finqiseenih, Yallittek diraabah ginnaasiteenih sugeenim keenik bayteh.
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ خَسِرُوٓاْ أَنفُسَهُمۡ وَضَلَّ عَنۡهُم مَّا كَانُواْ يَفۡتَرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: ulāika alladhīna khasirū anfusahum waḍalla ʿanhum mā kānū yaftarūna
